explanation: [0-0] A female police officer in a khaki uniform is standing on the steps by the road, holding a baton in her hand. She looks ahead, where a man in white is riding a bicycle with a large bag on the handlebars. Next to the bicycle are two people on a motorcycle. The motorcycle rider is wearing a white top and a red helmet, with a person wearing a yellow scarf sitting behind them. Many trees in the background are blocked off from the road by white planks.

[0-4] The policewoman bends over and turns her head to the distance, spotting a man wearing glasses riding a bicycle. The policewoman looks at the man, raises her baton and holds it in the middle of the road. The man also notices the policewoman and looks at her with fear.

[4-11] Seeing that the man didn't stop, the policewoman runs to the front of the bicycle, grabs the handlebars and stops the bicycle. The man looks at the policewoman in horror. The policewoman glares at the man angrily and uses the baton in her hand to knock on the bag on the handlebars, asking the man to take out what's inside. The man reluctantly watches as the policewoman takes out a red box from the bag and holds it in her hand. The policewoman stares intently at the box in the man's hand.

[30-40] The policewoman looks at the man. The man takes out a black pistol from the bag and points it at the policewoman. The frightened policewoman widens her eyes, shows a scared expression and raises her hands. The box and baton in her hands fall to the ground. The man laughs at the policewoman in front of him, points the gun in his hand to the side, and asks the policewoman to step aside. The policewoman raises her hands and steps aside. The man turns his head while holding the gun, glares at the policewoman, and rides away on his bicycle. In the end, the scared policewoman stands by the road with her hands raised and turns her head to look in the direction where the man left.
